DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety , tolerability antiviral activitity ALN-RSV01 RSV infect lung transplant patient
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study ALN-RSV01 Lung Transplant Patients Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV )
DOC.criteria: Single bilateral lung transplant recipient Confirmed RSV infection Greater 90 day post current lung transplant Rejection free minimum 1 month Antimicrobial therapy know viral , bacterial , fungal respiratory coinfection time diagnosis Bronchiolitis obliterans syndrome ( BOS ) Grade 3 state BOS FEV1 stable least 3 month Use alemtuzumab within 9 month prior screen ; antithymocyte globulin ( ATG ) thymoglobulin within 3 month screen : concurrent use > = 0.3 mg/kg/day prednisone equivalent maintenance therapy active treament acute graft rejection
